title: macOS Fast User Switching, Show Filename Extensions, and Automatic Text Corrections (com.apple.GlobalPreferences)
description: Preference settings for system-wide automatic text replacements: Correct spelling automatically, Capitalize words automatically, Add period with double-space, Touch Bar typing suggestions and Use smart quotes and dashes. Corresponds to System Preferences > Keyboard > Text tab. As well as preferences to disable Fast User Switching and to ensure that all file extensions are displayed.

NSAutomaticDashSubstitutionEnabled.title: Automatic Dash Substitution
NSAutomaticDashSubstitutionEnabled.description: Use smart dashes. Replace double-dashes with emdash.

NSAutomaticQuoteSubstitutionEnabled.title: Automatic Quote Substitution
NSAutomaticQuoteSubstitutionEnabled.description: Use smart quotes. Replace straight quotes with curly quotes.

NSAutomaticTextCompletionEnabled.title: Automatic Text Completion
NSAutomaticTextCompletionEnabled.description: Suggest corrections and replace text automatically.

AppleShowAllExtensions.title: Turn on filename extensions
AppleShowAllExtensions.description: If true, enables display of all filename extensions

MultipleSessionEnabled.title: Disable Fast User Switching
MultipleSessionEnabled.description: If false, disables Fast User Switching
